The Guardians of Guthix are a group of creatures chosen by Guthix himself, who were his trusted and empowered companions while he walked the world at the end of the Third Age. As he headed to sleep, he assigned some guardians to guard important locations or philosophies of the Guthixian religion at the end of the Third Age. According to Mod Osborne, there were originally as many Guardians as standing stones in a druids' circle, totalling eight.[1] Some of the Guardians are blessed with great power and/or wisdom on Gielinor, greater even than some low-tier gods and divine beings.

Known guardians[edit | edit source]

  • Juna - Guardian of the Tears of Guthix - Juna is the guardian of the Tears of Guthix cave, an underground spring where Guthix wept for those lost in the God Wars.
  • Death - Harold Death Esq., or the Grim Reaper, is tasked to regulate life in order to reach balance. He controls the process of respawning and has the ability to expand or shorten the lifespan of mortals in order to prevent or provide death, provided that individual's time has come. Per his role as a Guardian, he cannot randomly commit murders if their time hasn't come; likewise, he cannot save a life if their time has come, as much as he or they may wish it, or revive the dead.

  • Juna, the guardian snake of the Tears of Guthix.

  • Harold Death Esq. or The Grim Reaper, an undead human tasked with regulating death.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. IAm Dave Osborne, Senior Narrative Designer at Jagex Games Studio for the popular MMORPG RuneScape - AMAA!. Reddit. 25 January 2013. (Archived from the original on 17 June 2013.)

The '''Guardians of Guthix''' are a group of creatures chosen by [[Guthix]] himself, who were his trusted and empowered companions while he walked the world at the end of the [[Third Age]]. As he headed to sleep, he assigned some guardians to guard important locations or philosophies of the Guthixian religion at the end of the Third Age. According to Mod Osborne, there were originally as many Guardians as standing stones in a [[druids' circle]], totalling eight.{{CiteReddit|url=https://www.reddit.com/r/IAmA/comments/179syb/iam_dave_osborne_senior_narrative_designer_at/|title=IAm Dave Osborne, Senior Narrative Designer at Jagex Games Studio for the popular MMORPG RuneScape - AMAA!|date=25 January 2013|archiveurl=https://archive.is/MN2mk|archivedate=17 June 2013}} Some of the Guardians are blessed with great power and/or wisdom on [[Gielinor]], greater even than some low-tier [[gods]] and divine beings.

==Known guardians==
*[[Juna]] - '''Guardian of the [[Tears of Guthix (minigame)|Tears of Guthix]]''' - Juna is the guardian of the [[Tears of Guthix cave]], an underground spring where [[Guthix]] wept for those lost in the [[God Wars]].
*[[Grim Reaper|Death]] - Harold Death Esq., or '''the Grim Reaper''', is tasked to regulate life in order to reach balance. He controls the process of [[respawn]]ing and has the ability to expand or shorten the lifespan of mortals in order to prevent or provide death, provided that individual's time has come. Per his role as a Guardian, he cannot randomly commit murders if their time hasn't come; likewise, he cannot save a life if their time ''has'' come, as much as he or they may wish it, or revive the dead.
